title.title: Title
title.description: The title of this category, to be displayed at the top of its landing page

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: An item to use as this category's icon in the index (optionally including NBT)

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: If all entries in this category are currently locked or invisible to the player, don't show it all instead of simply displaying it as locked

ordinal.title: Ordinal
ordinal.description: A sorting index for this category, displayed in ascending order. Categories with no ordinal are displayed last
